patterns.match:
(?x:
  (typealias)
  \s+
  ([\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]*)
  \s*(=)\s*
  ((?x:
  (?x:
  [\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]* # ident
  \s*
  (?:<[^>]*>)? # optional type parameters
  \s*
  (?:\([^)]*\))? # optional constraint (this is an approximation)
  \s*
  \?? # optional nulability indicator
)
  \s*
  (\|\s*(?x:
  [\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]* # ident
  \s*
  (?:<[^>]*>)? # optional type parameters
  \s*
  (?:\([^)]*\))? # optional constraint (this is an approximation)
  \s*
  \?? # optional nulability indicator
))*
))
)

\b(new)\s+((?x:
  (?x:
  [\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]* # ident
  \s*
  (?:<[^>]*>)? # optional type parameters
  \s*
  (?:\([^)]*\))? # optional constraint (this is an approximation)
  \s*
  \?? # optional nulability indicator
)
  \s*
  (\|\s*(?x:
  [\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]* # ident
  \s*
  (?:<[^>]*>)? # optional type parameters
  \s*
  (?:\([^)]*\))? # optional constraint (this is an approximation)
  \s*
  \?? # optional nulability indicator
))*
))

\b(as)\s+((?x:
  (?x:
  [\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]* # ident
  \s*
  (?:<[^>]*>)? # optional type parameters
  \s*
  (?:\([^)]*\))? # optional constraint (this is an approximation)
  \s*
  \?? # optional nulability indicator
)
  \s*
  (\|\s*(?x:
  [\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]* # ident
  \s*
  (?:<[^>]*>)? # optional type parameters
  \s*
  (?:\([^)]*\))? # optional constraint (this is an approximation)
  \s*
  \?? # optional nulability indicator
))*
))
\b(true|false|null)\b
patterns.name: constant.character.language.pkl

patterns.begin:
(?x:
  (
    (?:\b|\s*)[\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]* # variable name
    |
    `[^`]+` # quoted variable name
  )
  \s*
  (:)
  \s*
  ((?x:
  (?x:
  [\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]* # ident
  \s*
  (?:<[^>]*>)? # optional type parameters
  \s*
  (?:\([^)]*\))? # optional constraint (this is an approximation)
  \s*
  \?? # optional nulability indicator
)
  \s*
  (\|\s*(?x:
  [\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]* # ident
  \s*
  (?:<[^>]*>)? # optional type parameters
  \s*
  (?:\([^)]*\))? # optional constraint (this is an approximation)
  \s*
  \?? # optional nulability indicator
))*
)) # type
)

patterns.match:
(?x:
  (
    \b[\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]* # variable name
    |
    `[^`]+` # quoted variable name
  )
  \s*
  (=)(?!=)
)

(:)\s*((?x:
  (?x:
  [\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]* # ident
  \s*
  (?:<[^>]*>)? # optional type parameters
  \s*
  (?:\([^)]*\))? # optional constraint (this is an approximation)
  \s*
  \?? # optional nulability indicator
)
  \s*
  (\|\s*(?x:
  [\p{L}_$][\p{L}0-9_$]* # ident
  \s*
  (?:<[^>]*>)? # optional type parameters
  \s*
  (?:\([^)]*\))? # optional constraint (this is an approximation)
  \s*
  \?? # optional nulability indicator
))*
))
\b(hidden|local|abstract|external|open|in|out|amends|extends|fixed|const)\b
patterns.name: storage.modifier.pkl

patterns.match: \b(amends|as|extends|function|is|let|read|read\?|import|throw|trace)\b
patterns.name: keyword.pkl

patterns.match: \b(if|else|when|for|import|new)\b
patterns.name: keyword.control.pkl

patterns.match:
(?x:
  \b
  0x(?:[\da-fA-F][\da-fA-F_]*[\da-fA-F]|[\da-fA-F_])
  \b
)
patterns.name: constant.numeric.hex.pkl

patterns.match:
(?x:
  \b
  (?:
    (?:\d[0-9_]*\d|\d)?              # 0 or more digits
    \.                               # dot literal
    (?:\d[0-9_]*\d|\d)               # 1 or more digits
    (?:[eE][+-]?(?:\d[0-9_]*\d|\d))? # optional exponent
    |                                # OR
    (?:\d[0-9_]*\d|\d)               # 1 or more digits
    [eE][+-]?(?:\d[0-9_]*\d|\d)      # exponent
  )
  \b
)
patterns.name: constant.numeric.pkl

patterns.match:
(?x:
  # MATH
  \+    # add
  |
  -     # minus
  |
  \*    # multiply
  |
  /     # divide
  |
  ~/    # integer divide
  |
  %     # modulo
  |
  \*\*  # power
  |
  >     # greater than
  |
  >=    # greater than or equals
  |
  <     # less than
  |
  <=    # less than or equals
  |
  ==    # equals
  |
  !=    # not equals

  # LOGICAL
  |
  !     # unary not
  |
  &&    # and
  |
  \|\|  # or
  |

  # MISCELLANEOUS
  \|>   # function pipe
  |
  \?\?  # nullish coalesce
  |
  !!    # non-null assertion
  |
  =     # assignment
  |
  ->    # lambda arrow
  |
  \|    # type union
)
patterns.name: keyword.operator.pkl

patterns.match: \b(this|module|outer|super)\b
patterns.name: variable.language.pkl

patterns.match: \b(unknown|never)\b
patterns.name: support.type.pkl

patterns.match: \b(class|typealias)\b
patterns.name: keyword.class.pkl

patterns.match:
(?x:
  \.\?  # optional chain
  |
  \.    # member access
  |
  ;     # semicolon
  |
  :     # colon
)
patterns.name: punctuation.pkl

patterns.match:
(?x:                 # turn on extended mode
  \\
  (?:
    [trn"\\]         # tab, carriage return, newline, quote, backslash
    |                # OR
    u                # the letter u
    \{               # curly opening brace literal
    [\da-fA-F]+      # 1 or more hex number literal
    }                # curly end literal
    |                # OR
    \(               # interpolation start
    .+?              # one or more characters lazily (correct syntax highlighting within here should be provided by semantic tokens)
    \)               # interpolation end
  )
  |                  # OR
  (                  # capture group: invalid escape
    \\   # the escape char
    .                # any character
  )
)
patterns.name: constant.character.escape.0.pkl

patterns.end:
(?x:
  (")         # string end
  |                     # OR
  (.?$)                 # error; unterminated string (flag last character as an error)
)
patterns.name: string.quoted.double.0.pkl

patterns.match:
(?x:                 # turn on extended mode

  (?:
    [trn"\\]         # tab, carriage return, newline, quote, backslash

    .                # any character

(?x:                 # turn on extended mode

    |                # OR

    \{               # curly opening brace literal
    [\da-fA-F]+      # 1 or more hex number literal
    }                # curly end literal

)
